review: I am a big fan of thriller movies. Recently I heard that graduation's exams are postponed. I wanted some celebration of my kind like watching thriller cinema. I searched film on IMDB by rating and review..I watched. The plot, direction, acting,cast and topic everything was awesome about this movie. But....It's 2:20am and till 11:30 I was very happy.. Now m quiet disturbed. Movie just made me feel very uncomfortable Idk why but it made me..I really dislike this movie on the basis of entertainment ...MORE

I am a big fan of thriller movies. Recently I heard that graduation's exams are postponed. I wanted some celebration of my kind like watching thriller cinema. I searched film on IMDB by rating and review..I watched. The plot, direction, acting,cast and topic everything was awesome about this movie. But....It's 2:20am and till 11:30 I was very happy.. Now m quiet disturbed. Movie just made me feel very uncomfortable Idk why but it made me..I really dislike this movie on the basis of entertainment. A cinema's primary aim is entertainment and all I got was the depression.

Not everyone's cup of tea. Keep in mind its a psychological thriller and it proved itself. Don't expect more suspense in it, but story line is superb for a psycho-thriller. Acting, they just nailed it. Its weird, but you will love it.
The real catch according to me is its direction. The way movie goes... Specially the contrasting background music of action scenes... Loved that..
I had more expectations from this movie, there are many problems with the story I felt the makers tried to serve many things but failed doing so.
Good movie.Not just a watchable one,I liked it and that's a rare thing.
movie is worth watching. very similar to paanch. but none character matched luke morrision (kay kay menon).
Very good especially Rajeev Khandelwal and Kalki, brilliant performance
Please tell me the heart attacking horror movie.
very bad Allah will kill saitaan
